深入挖掘巨大柏树的心材内部 Burrowing deep into the heartwood of a massive Cypress
大声合击颚部以吓唬鱼类 Loudly clicking their jaws together to frighten Fish
紧紧抓住独木舟的底部 Clasping firmly to the underside of a Canoe
正在分解大部分已失效的木制傀儡 Mulching mostly deactivated Wood Golems
